body:
test passed.
refer to this link for build results: https://ci.owncloud.org/job/pull-request-analyser/370/

thanks @vicdeo! :+1: 

i added the related issues to the pull request to close them now that this will be backported.

i have two failing tests locally:
testgetputcontents:
````

phpunit_framework_expectationfailedexception : file not emptied
failed asserting that two strings are equal. <click to see difference>

#0 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/assert.php(2134): phpunit_framework_constraint_isequal->evaluate('lorem ipsum dol...', 'file not emptie...')
#1 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/assert.php(475): phpunit_framework_assert::assertthat('lorem ipsum dol...', object(phpunit_framework_constraint_isequal), 'file not emptie...')
#2 /home/deepdiver/development/owncloud/stable5/tests/lib/files/storage/storage.php(98): phpunit_framework_assert::assertequals('', 'lorem ipsum dol...', 'file not emptie...')
#3 [internal function]: test\files\storage\storage->testgetputcontents()
#4 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testcase.php(976): reflectionmethod->invokeargs(object(test\files\storage\google), array)
#5 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testcase.php(831): phpunit_framework_testcase->runtest()
#6 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testresult.php(648): phpunit_framework_testcase->runbare()
#7 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testcase.php(776): phpunit_framework_testresult->run(object(test\files\storage\google))
#8 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testsuite.php(775): phpunit_framework_testcase->run(object(phpunit_framework_testresult))
#9 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testsuite.php(745): phpunit_framework_testsuite->runtest(object(test\files\storage\google), object(phpunit_framework_testresult))
#10 /usr/share/php/phpunit/textui/testrunner.php(349): phpunit_framework_testsuite->run(object(phpunit_framework_testresult), false, array, array, false)
#11 /usr/share/php/phpunit/textui/command.php(176): phpunit_textui_testrunner->dorun(object(phpunit_framework_testsuite), array)
#12 /tmp/ide-phpunit.php(260): phpunit_textui_command->run(array, true)
#13 /tmp/ide-phpunit.php(498): ide_base_phpunit_textui_command::main()
#14 {main}
````

teststat:
````

phpunit_framework_expectationfailedexception : failed asserting that false is true.
#0 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/constraint.php(91): phpunit_framework_constraint->fail(false, '')
#1 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/assert.php(2134): phpunit_framework_constraint->evaluate(false, '')
#2 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/assert.php(888): phpunit_framework_assert::assertthat(false, object(phpunit_framework_constraint_istrue), '')
#3 /home/deepdiver/development/owncloud/stable5/tests/lib/files/storage/storage.php(172): phpunit_framework_assert::asserttrue(false)
#4 [internal function]: test\files\storage\storage->teststat()
#5 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testcase.php(976): reflectionmethod->invokeargs(object(test\files\storage\google), array)
#6 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testcase.php(831): phpunit_framework_testcase->runtest()
#7 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testresult.php(648): phpunit_framework_testcase->runbare()
#8 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testcase.php(776): phpunit_framework_testresult->run(object(test\files\storage\google))
#9 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testsuite.php(775): phpunit_framework_testcase->run(object(phpunit_framework_testresult))
#10 /usr/share/php/phpunit/framework/testsuite.php(745): phpunit_framework_testsuite->runtest(object(test\files\storage\google), object(phpunit_framework_testresult))
#11 /usr/share/php/phpunit/textui/testrunner.php(349): phpunit_framework_testsuite->run(object(phpunit_framework_testresult), false, array, array, false)
#12 /usr/share/php/phpunit/textui/command.php(176): phpunit_textui_testrunner->dorun(object(phpunit_framework_testsuite), array)
#13 /tmp/ide-phpunit.php(260): phpunit_textui_command->run(array, true)
#14 /tmp/ide-phpunit.php(498): ide_base_phpunit_textui_command::main()
#15 {main}
````
@mtgap can you please have a look? thx
i know there were tests adjusted and i believe they weren't backported. i'm guessing that's what these are, i'll take a closer look tomorrow.
